title: Losing connection in champ load screen
body: Just lost connection in the champ load screen, even though I clearly had internet (watching twitch, browsing reddit, etc.). After restarting client 4 times and still having the same error message, I restarted PC. Logged back in, same error message. So I give up. 2 minutes later I get punished for leaving the game. Any help would be appreciated, thanks.

replies.body: don't bother posting about this.. I stuck with a leave buster bc I could not connect to the game during champ select when they were having issue.. the bored was full off ppl saying the game will not let them connect and riot even said there having issues... yet we all got leavebusters.. they don't care about customer support..
Same here, cant start a single game. Used to work perfectly fine two days ago. Any other games/stuff is working as well - its only league, so no, its not me. Please fix your problem.

Even though your net works elsewhere, you can still have issues with specific servers like champion select or the game servers.  Restarting your PC is a solid plan, but it might not resolve issues with your network.  Instead, run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot, and test it in a custom game.  Let me know if that helps.
